name: Tome full of stars
description:
Use arrow keys to move and interact.

A thief breaks into a mansion with one aim - to steal the tome of constellations. 

For centuries the stars have been missing from the sky, with the tome the thief can return them. It means breaking into a place full of traps, a place she never dreamed of going to go back to.

///

Made using bitsy. Framing inspired by Mark Wonnacott's No Destination. Some book and flower names from Library of Babel and Fantasy Florist
